tech_news.title: PlayStation State Of Play February 2026: All The Biggest Announcements And Games - GameSpot
tech_news.description: 2026's first State of Play was well worth its runtime.

tech_news.title: Turns out Game Freak's "relatively small" internal team is supported by "several dozen" development partners for Beast of Reincarnation - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Game Freak has shed a little more light on the "relatively small" internal team working on its upcoming release, Beast of Reincarnation.

tech_news.title: God of War goes 2D with pixelated Sons of Sparta (which is out right now!) as original PS2 trilogy eyes up the remake treatment - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Santa Monica Studio has revealed a new game in the God of War series, and it is a 2D side-scroller.

tech_news.title: Legacy of Kain: Ascendance, the First New Legacy of Kain Game in Over Two Decades, Is Out Next Month - IGN
tech_news.description: Crystal Dynamics has revealed the first brand new Legacy of Kain game in over two decades. It's called Legacy of Kain: Ascendance, and it's out sooner than you'd think: on March 31, 2026. That's next month!

tech_news.title: ‘Marathon’ Announces Free Open Beta Release Date, And It’s A Bit Late - Forbes
tech_news.description: Bungie has announced the dates for Marathon's free open beta preview test, and it's going to be pretty late in the game.

tech_news.title: Silent Hill: Townfall launches in 2026 for PS5, PC; reveal trailer - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Silent Hill: Townfall will launch in 2026 for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, publishers Konami and Annapurna Interactive, and developer Screen Burn Interactive announced.

tech_news.title: Project Windless Is A Dynasty Warriors-Like Action RPG Where You Play As A Sword-Wielding Chicken - Game Informer
tech_news.description: It's based on the South Korean high fantasy novel series, The Bird That Drinks Tears.

tech_news.title: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2 announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Konami has announced Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC (Steam). It includes Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and the HD Col…

tech_news.title: Shueisha Games and ACQUIRE announce co-op stealth action game Yakoh Shinobi Ops for PS5, PC - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Publisher Shueisha Games and developer ACQUIRE have announced four-shinobi cooperative stealth action game Yakoh Shinobi Ops for PlayStation 5 and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2027.

tech_news.title: Rayman 30th Anniversary Edition Releases Tomorrow, Collects Five Versions Of The Original Game - Game Informer
tech_news.description: Starting tomorrow you can play the PlayStation, Atari Jaguar, MS-DOS, Game Boy Advance, and Game Boy Color versions of the original Rayman in one release.
